aboutme.name: Rahul Nair
aboutme.summary: As a recent graduate with a Bachelor's degree from SRM Institute of Science and Technology, I am excited to start my career as a Frontend Developer. I am passionate about creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites using my knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React and Angular. Started my career with Deloitte as a campus hire is trained in front-end technologies and is self taught and gained experience through project via internship in embedded systems, C, C++, smart systems in hybrid vehicles and automation.I have worked in Internet of things, web apps and microcontroller

deloitte.summary: A campus hire who joined Deloitte in the month of Jan 2023, got selected in Customer & Marketing Profile. Have been trained under front-end technologies with and excellence record of clearing both stage gates at first attempt. The training included HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3 and JavaScript. Also trained in Bootstrap, SAAS and LESS. Contained course and assignments on React, Angular, Node.js and jQuery

project.title: Agami Arogya

project.title: AIQ and server room temperature controller
project.desc: provides a combination of process of sensing several gas levels in the air along with the ambient temperature and humidity on LCD screen embedded with ESP8266 microcontroller and in mobile Application enabling to controll relays connected to appliances of server room.

project.title: Home Automation
